description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Barley, Lentil & Vegetable Soup With Parsley Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free
name: Vegan Barley, Lentil & Vegetable Soup With Parsley Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup parsley, stalks removed (for parsley pesto)
3 tbs extra virgin olive oil (save 2 tbs for parsley pesto)
3 clove garlic, crushed (save 2 cloves garlic peeled for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic and thyme. Cook, stirring frequently, for about 5 minutes. Add carrot, celery, potato, barley and lentils. Cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes. Add stock. Bring to the boil, then simmer for 40 minutes or until barley is tender.
Meanwhile, to make the pesto, place all ingredients into a food processor and process until mixture forms a paste.
Add broccoli and capsicum to soup. Simmer for another 5 minutes. Serve soup topped with parsley pesto.
